Package examples

Class Summary
Akari Akari puzzle by Nikoli http://www.nikoli.co.jp/en/puzzles/akari/
Examples Various example programs.
Family Example obtained from "Finite Domain Constraint Programming in Oz" Maria and Clara are both heads of households, and both families have three boys and three girls.
FirstStep First step example.
FourColor Four color problem.
FT06 Job-shop scheduling benchmark problem of FT06.
Golomb Golomb ruler.
JavaCreamSolver Cryptarithmetic puzzle.
JSSP Job-shop scheduling benchmark problems.
Magic Magic squares.
Magic3 Magic squares of 3*3.
PP Production planning.
Queens N-Queens problem
Sudoku Sudoku puzzle.
